channel.title: Happy on Dheepak's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Happy on Dheepak's blog

item.title: Weekly Update 3 - Sep 13, 2020
item.description: This is the third instalment of weekly update. Let’s revisit the interesting things that I came across in between last Monday and today (September 13, 2020). Word count at 800. Some interesting items from the past week The AIIMS Story I happened to read about the founder of AIIMS - Rajkumari Amrit Kaur. This piece from Indian Express details on how she dreamt about an institute for medical higher education in India.
